Title: Makes provisions with respect to the manner of selecting judges and justices of the unified court system; repealer
Summary: Establishes a system of merit selection of judges of the state's major trial courts instead of elections and for the designation of certain justices of the supreme court; affects certain courts including the supreme court, surrogate's court, the New York city civil court, the New York city criminal court and the district court.
LawCode: Rpld Art 6 ยง21, amd Constn, generally
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing amendments to article 6 of the constitution, in relation to the manner of selecting judges and justices of the unified court system, and to repeal section 21 of article 6 thereof relating thereto
